name: AstroVR
description:
AstroVR - Experience a new type of astronomy!

A hyper-accurate star and planet viewer for the HTC Vive, (Oculus, Google Cardboard, and Gear VR coming soon.)

(AstroVR (formerly StarVR) started as an Engineering fair project and is still maintained and developed by the  student who started the project.  All funds go to help further development.)

  • Won 1st place at Catherine Blaine K-8 Science and Engineering Fair.
  • Won Best Overall Engineering Project at the Seattle Public Schools Science and         Engineering Fair.
    • Features

    View planets, moons, constellations, and more in AstroVR!  A cheap alternative to indoor astronomy. View over 119,613 stars, satellites, or the whole Solar System at once! With an easy to use UI and detailed graphics, you can learn about astronomy in ways never before possible.

    Contact Us

    We love to hear feedback about our apps! Feel free to tweet at us.
